title: Decentralized Sous Sous Savings
description: Developing good savings habits when in an economically disadvantaged position is hard. The habit is hard to develop, but valuable to learn.
solution: Sou Sou - a traditional rotating savings by a group of individuals with one spend per cycle of the "pot" collected by one "hand".
experience: My mother helped grew her good savings habits (and community participation) with this system by participating in such a sou sou savings pool
